member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Scaffolding.SqlServerTableSelectionSetExtensions.Allows(Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Scaffolding.TableSelectionSet,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Tests whether the schema/table is allowed by the and updates the 's (s) to mark that they have been matched.
member.param: name of the database schema to check
name of the database table to check
member.returns: whether or not the schema/table is allowed

member.summary: Found a column on foreign key [{schemaName}].[{tableName}].[{fkName}] with an empty or null name. Not including column in foreign key

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Internal.SqlServerDesignStrings.ColumnNotInSelectionSet(System.Object,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Column {columnName} belongs to table [{schema}].[{tableName}] which is not included in the selection set. Skipping.

member.name: M:Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Internal.SqlServerDesignStrings.DataTypeDoesNotAllowSqlServerIdentityStrategy(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: For column {columnId}. This column is set up as an Identity column, but the SQL Server data type is {sqlServerDataType}. This will be mapped to CLR type byte which does not allow the SqlServerValueGenerationStrategy.IdentityColumn setting. Generating a matching Property but ignoring the Identity setting.
